game.name: Isekai Captain
game.genres: 캐주얼, 인디, RPG, 시뮬레이션, 전략, 앞서 해보기
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: "Isekai Captain" is a 2D fantasy Roguelike where you lead a squad against demons. Customize your hero, choose classes like Warrior or Hunter, and unlock advanced roles. Explore Kalan, grow your team, and stop the Demon King’s awakening in this epic adventure!
game.shortDescriptionEn: "Isekai Captain" is a 2D fantasy Roguelike where you lead a squad against demons. Customize your hero, choose classes like Warrior or Hunter, and unlock advanced roles. Explore Kalan, grow your team, and stop the Demon King’s awakening in this epic adventure!
